name: Wyndham Tampa Westshore

reviews.text: Stayed in room 728 for three nights. King-sized bed, quiet side of hotel. All dealings with staff were great. V. friendly and helpful. Bar and restaurant a little slow, but people were nice. The free shuttle is a wonderful service - the only bummer is that it does not start operating until 6am, too late for early-morning flights. The room was well kept and pretty clean. The bathroom could use a little love and some touch-up painting - and a light over the shower. Good-sized flat screen TV. Room service menu adequate and v. well priced for room service. I got a cup of Starbucks coffee and a yogurt parfait one morning for less than $9. Room service is usually such a rip off, it was a nice surprise. My floor was pretty loud Saturday night - lots of doors slamming and people yelling. Also had a fire at the hotel, which put us outside from 1:30-2:30 am. As helicopters circled and fire engines blared, it would have been really nice to have hotel staff circling the building telling guests what was going on. I was also surprised that no one was making guests get away from the building. It turned out to be a small fire, luckily. The price of this hotel is very fair considering all the amenities and service. I paid average of $113/nite with AAA.
reviews.title: Well priced, super service

likes.disliked: — communication during small fire could have been better

reviews.text: I stayed at the Quorum Hotel Tampa for 6 days and 5 nights in September 2008 while attending an event in the hotel. The staff was equal to the staff at the Savoy hotel in London. The staff at all levels were extremely friendly and helpful from the housekeeping staff to the restaurant staff. The staff at the front desk could not have been more friendly and helpful from begining to end of my stay. The restaurant is small but the food is excellent. The bed and pillows were very comfortable and four fresh towels were in the room every day. I rate a hotel by the thicknees of their towels and the amount in my room. I want at least four towels, two hand towels and two face cloths, to me it is a sign of a hotel with quality. I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend this hotel to anyone. BT
reviews.title: Quorum Hotal Tampa-Service with a Smile

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for one night so that we could attend the Tampa Bay Bucc's game.
reviews.title: Great Find
Nice visit
reviews.text: From arriving to leaving we were happy with the staff and the accommodation.
Our room was on the 9th floor - number 911.
reviews.title: Loved the Quorum
Loved it
reviews.text: Great Stay, great service, Room very comfortable, Excellent for business travelers as well as family. Location right of the highways.

We booked the Quorum via Expedia for a weekend stay prior to cruising out of the Port of Tampa. Very close to airport, malls, restaurants, etc. Clean, comfortable room and my wife and daughters enjoyed the Bath and Body Works toiletries. Nice pool and fitness center, great breakfast and a decent selection of books available to quests. We found the complimentary shuttle service very useful. They will take you anywhere inside a three mile radius - two malls, wal-mart, k-mart, etc., call them and they will come back and pick you up! Although we did not book the stay and cruise package, they did offer to take our family to the port for only $20.00, half off the taxi price. Excellent service from staff, very friendly and professional. We'll be back next time in Tampa.
reviews.title: Great service, convenience

reviews.text: Scott Thompson
reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst

likes.liked: — Lobby, lending library, location to airport
likes.disliked: — Standard room, paid wifi in room, old feel of room

reviews.text: Hazard, Kentucky
reviews.title: Great for the business traveler!
The hotel Quorum is a great hotel.
reviews.text: My wife and I came to this hotel for a conference. This was the final meeting of several quarterly meetings, and after being at luxury hotels like the Four Seasons Chicago and The Ritz Carlton Amelia Island, the Quorum was a bit of a shock and setback. The lobby, pool area, and work out facilities were very nice. Staff was friendly and helpful, and we appreciated the lending library service. The room was poor, with older decor, cracked sink, small tv, and antiquated a/c unit. Bed was comfortable but only three bad pillows. Free wifi in lobby but our room required payment, so that was an annoyance. The hotel did offer newly renovated "club level" rooms but as the hotel was full and we were at our per-diem amount, we stayed with our standard room. Perhaps the extra $30 for club level would be worth it.

Recently stayed for one week at the Quorum Hotel in Tampa. The staff was pleasant, helpful, and resolved any problem that arose. Hotel is situated near airport, and two malls with numerous eating establishments around.
reviews.title: Great for business travel

reviews.text: Rooms are above average with flat screen television. Bed very comfortable, and quiet, so able to sleep.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay!

likes.liked: — Pay per view movies on a flat screen tv!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel also has wireless in lobby that they advertise, but didn't use it so not sure how it worked.
reviews.title: Loved It!!!

reviews.text: Pool, hot tub, and exercise room with machine weights, some free weights, and tread mills.
reviews.title: absolutely lovely hotel

likes.liked: — the cleanliness and slightly sophisticated atmosphere
likes.disliked: — the bottom sheet of the king size bed wasn't a fitted one and kept wrinkling

reviews.title: Very nice hotel
reviews.text: All in all, Quorum worked well for a week a business travel. Slept good with no complaints.

After staying in a near by Hotel a few times and being dissatisfied with several services I decided to try out the Quorum Hotel. It is convieniently located and all the services were excellent. I am having all my staff stay there when they visit our Tampa office.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: After an arduous day of business travel from Denver to Tampa I arrived at Quorum to find my reservation had been "mishandled". The hotel took full responsibility and held themselves fully accountable. Quorum secured accomodations at a nearby hotel at no expense and little inconvenience for the first night as they were fully booked. When I returned the next day to complete my stay in Tampa, Quorum stepped up and created a wonderful experience for the remainder of my visit. In our day when corporations, CEOs and staff dodge responsibility and accountability it was refreshing to experience Quorum. I believe it was Casy Stengler that said "Tough times don't build character, they reveal character"...Quorum revealed character.
reviews.title: Rough Start but Beautiful Finish

reviews.text: JH-Littleton, CO
reviews.title: Outstanding Hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My recent stay at the Quorum was phenomenal. Service was great from making the reservation to checking-out. The hotel restaurant/bar was a highlight of my stay. The whole hotel was great. The staff was extremely friendly and took great care of us everyday.
reviews.title: Excellent Experience

reviews.text: We stayed at the Quorum during the Outback Pro Am golf tournament along with (2) other friend couples. The service at the Quorum was super. I liked the decor, the restaurant / bar in the lobby and the hospitality of the front desk. I would recommend the Quorum to anyone traveling to the Tampa area.
reviews.title: Best Business Resort Experience Ever!

likes.liked: — The staff, the food and the rooms

description: Discover heartwarming ambiance and distinctive personal service at The Wyndham Tampa Westshore, our exceptionally located Tampa hotel. Sit back and enjoy our all-new Blue Water Grill restaurant and bar - complete with "seating cabanas," appointed with pillows, faux shades, and natural teak wood - creating a romantic feel that recalls Ernest Hemingway's distinguished era. Or relax in our spacious, well-appointed accommodations.
